oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Red Foley Show - Audition
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Audition for WSM program The Red Foley Show, featuring announcer David Cobb, host/performer Red Foley, and performers the Jordanaires, Owen Bradley, and the Jewel Quintet (including Grady Martin and Billy Robinson). Sponsored by Swift's Jewel shortening. Not later than and likely recorded in 1950, though possibly late 1940s (unconfirmed).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Red Foley; Jordanaires; Owen Bradley; Jewel Quintet
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Hominy Grits) -- Opening statement (David Cobb) -- Jewel Shortening jingle (Jordanaires) -- Red Foley talks -- Cincinnati Dancing Pig (Red Foley) -- Jewel Shortening commercial (David Cobb, Red Foley) -- Jewel Shortening jingle (Red Foley) -- Red Foley introduces the Jordanaires -- Dig A Little Deeper (Jordanaires) -- Red Foley introduces the Jewel Quintet -- Steel Guitar Stomp (Jewel Quintet) -- Jewel Shortening jingle (Jordanaires) -- Jewel Shortening commercial (Red Foley) -- David Cobb introduces Red Foley -- Red Foley reads a Keepsake Album story -- Where Could I Go But To The Lord (Red Foley, Jordanaires) -- David Cobb and Red Foley talk -- Jewel Oil commercial (David Cobb) -- Theme (Hominy Grits) -- Closing statement (David Cobb, Red Foley) -- Jewel jingle (Red Foley, Jordanaires)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Red Foley show (Radio program); Foley, Red, 1910-1968; Cobb, David (Announcer); Jordanaires (Musical group); Bradley, Owen; Jewel Quintet (Musical group); Martin, Grady, 1929-; Robinson, Billy, 1931-
